subtext.desc.SecurityMonitoring.no.setti: Keep your devices safe by setting up security features.
subtext.desc.SecurityMonitoring.no.event: There have been no security events.
Activate the feature that blocks the execution of unauthorized apps and access from malicious IPs on all devices registered in the Workspace.
*This feature is only supported on {{0}} models.
It blocks the execution of applications other than those allowed by the device.
It blocks IP based on data from the Malware Information Sharing Platform when a malicious IP attempts to access the device or when the device tries to connect to a malicious IP.
* Security event logs are collected when enabled, even if features are not selected. To stop collecting security logs, please choose Disable.
